verses.verse: וַתֵּצֵ֤א <S%H3318><s%> vat-te-Tze went out דִינָה֙ <S%H1783><s%> di-Nah And Dinah בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> bat- the daughter לֵאָ֔ה <S%H3812><s%> le-'Ah, of Leah אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom יָלְדָ֖ה <S%H3205><s%> Yal-dah which she bare לְיַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> le-ya-'a-Ko; unto Jacob לִרְא֖וֹת <S%H7200><s%> lir-'ot to see בִּבְנ֥וֹת <S%H1323><s%> biv-Not the daughters הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. of the land

וַיַּ֨רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar saw אֹתָ֜הּ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tah שְׁכֶ֧ם <S%H7927><s%> she-Chem And when Shechem בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son חֲמ֛וֹר <S%H2544><s%> cha-Mor of Hamor הַֽחִוִּ֖י <S%H2340><s%> ha-chiv-Vi the Hivite נְשִׂ֣יא <S%H5387><s%> ne-Si prince הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; of the country וַיִּקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach her he took אֹתָ֛הּ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tah וַיִּשְׁכַּ֥ב <S%H7901><s%> vai-yish-Kav her and lay אֹתָ֖הּ <S%H854><s%> 'o-Tah her by וַיְעַנֶּֽהָ׃ <S%H6031><s%> vay-'an-Ne-ha. with her and defiled her

וַתִּדְבַּ֣ק <S%H1692><s%> vat-tid-Bak clave נַפְשׁ֔וֹ <S%H5315><s%> naf-Sho, And his soul בְּדִינָ֖ה <S%H1783><s%> be-di-Nah unto Dinah בַּֽת־ <S%H1323><s%> bat- the daughter יַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko; of Jacob וַיֶּֽאֱהַב֙ <S%H157><s%> vai-ye-'e-Hav and he loved אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַֽנַּעֲרָ֔ <S%H5291><s%> han-na-'a-Ra, the damsel וַיְדַבֵּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber and spake עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and לֵ֥ב <S%H3820><s%> lev kindly הַֽנַּעֲרָֽ׃ <S%H5291><s%> Han-na-'a-ra. unto the damsel

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer spake שְׁכֶ֔ם <S%H7927><s%> she-Chem, And Shechem אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about חֲמ֥וֹר <S%H2544><s%> cha-Mor Hamor אָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv unto his father לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying קַֽח־ <S%H3947><s%> kach- Get לִ֛י li אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַיַּלְדָּ֥ה <S%H3207><s%> hai-yal-Dah me this damsel הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot for לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> le-'ish-Shah. to wife

וְיַעֲקֹ֣ב <S%H3290><s%> ve-ya-'a-Ko And Jacob שָׁמַ֗ע <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma', heard כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for טִמֵּא֙ <S%H2930><s%> tim-Me that he had defiled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דִּינָ֣ה <S%H1783><s%> di-Nah Dinah בִתּ֔וֹ <S%H1323><s%> vit-To, his daughter וּבָנָ֛יו <S%H1121><s%> u-va-Nav now his sons הָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu become אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- were with מִקְנֵ֖הוּ <S%H4735><s%> mik-Ne-hu were with his cattle בַּשָּׂדֶ֑ה <S%H7704><s%> bas-sa-Deh; in the field וְהֶחֱרִ֥שׁ <S%H2790><s%> ve-he-che-Rish held his peace יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko and Jacob עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until בֹּאָֽם׃ <S%H935><s%> bo-'Am. until they were come

וַיֵּצֵ֛א <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-Tze went out חֲמ֥וֹר <S%H2544><s%> cha-Mor And Hamor אֲבִֽי־ <S%H1><s%> 'a-vi- the father שְׁכֶ֖ם <S%H7927><s%> she-Chem of Shechem אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko; unto Jacob לְדַבֵּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> le-dab-Ber to commune אִתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H854><s%> it-To. with

וּבְנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons יַעֲקֹ֜ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko of Jacob בָּ֤אוּ <S%H935><s%> Ba-'u came מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh out of the field כְּשָׁמְעָ֔ם <S%H8085><s%> ke-sha-me-'Am, when they heard וַיִּֽתְעַצְּבוּ֙ <S%H6087><s%> vai-yit-'atz-tze-Vu were grieved הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> ha-'a-na-Shim, and the men וַיִּ֥חַר <S%H2734><s%> vai-Yi-char wroth לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od; and they were very כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- because נְבָלָ֞ה <S%H5039><s%> ne-va-Lah folly עָשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah because he had wrought בְיִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> ve-Yis-ra-'El, in Israel לִשְׁכַּב֙ <S%H7901><s%> lish-Kav in lying אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- for בַּֽת־ <S%H1323><s%> bat- daughter יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko, with Jacob's וְכֵ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> ve-Chen such לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יֵעָשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> ye-'a-Seh. which thing ought not to be done

וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber communed חֲמ֖וֹר <S%H2544><s%> cha-Mor And Hamor אִתָּ֣ם <S%H854><s%> 'it-Tam for לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; with them saying שְׁכֶ֣ם <S%H7927><s%> she-Chem Shechem בְּנִ֗י <S%H1121><s%> be-Ni, of my son חָֽשְׁקָ֤ה <S%H2836><s%> cha-she-Kah longeth נַפְשׁוֹ֙ <S%H5315><s%> naf-Sho The soul בְּבִתְּכֶ֔ם <S%H1323><s%> be-vit-te-Chem, for your daughter תְּנ֨וּ <S%H5414><s%> te-Nu I pray you give נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> na please אֹתָ֛הּ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tah ל֖וֹ lo לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> le-'ish-Shah. her him to wife

וְהִֽתְחַתְּנ֖וּ <S%H2859><s%> ve-hit-chat-te-Nu And make ye marriages אֹתָ֑נוּ <S%H854><s%> 'o-Ta-nu; for בְּנֹֽתֵיכֶם֙ <S%H1323><s%> be-no-tei-Chem your daughters תִּתְּנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> tit-te-nu- with us [and] give לָ֔נוּ La-nu, וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בְּנֹתֵ֖ינוּ <S%H1323><s%> be-no-Tei-nu our daughters תִּקְח֥וּ <S%H3947><s%> tik-Chu unto us and take לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

וְאִתָּ֖נוּ <S%H854><s%> ve-'it-Ta-nu for תֵּשֵׁ֑בוּ <S%H3427><s%> te-She-vu; And ye shall dwell וְהָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> ve-ha-'A-retz with us and the land תִּהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yeh shall be לִפְנֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> lif-nei-Chem, before you שְׁבוּ֙ <S%H3427><s%> she-Vu dwell וּסְחָר֔וּהָ <S%H5503><s%> u-se-cha-Ru-ha, and trade וְהֵֽאָחֲז֖וּ <S%H270><s%> ve-he-'a-cha-Zu ye therein and get you possessions בָּֽהּ׃ Bah.

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said שְׁכֶם֙ <S%H7927><s%> she-Chem And Shechem אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to her אָבִ֣יה <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vih unto her father וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and to אַחֶ֔יהָ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chei-ha, and unto her brethren אֶמְצָא־ <S%H4672><s%> 'em-tza- Let me find חֵ֖ן <S%H2580><s%> chen grace בְּעֵינֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-nei-Chem; in your eyes וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> va-'a-Sher whatever תֹּאמְר֛וּ <S%H559><s%> to-me-Ru and what ye shall say אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai then אֶתֵּֽן׃ <S%H5414><s%> 'et-Ten. unto me I will give

הַרְבּ֨וּ <S%H7235><s%> har-Bu Ask עָלַ֤י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai ever מְאֹד֙ <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od me never so much מֹ֣הַר <S%H4119><s%> Mo-har dowry וּמַתָּ֔ן <S%H4976><s%> u-mat-Tan, and gift וְאֶ֨תְּנָ֔ה <S%H5414><s%> ve-'Et-te-Nah, and I will give כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after תֹּאמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> to-me-Ru according as ye shall say אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai; to me וּתְנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> u-te-nu- unto me but give לִ֥י li אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַֽנַּעֲרָ֖ <S%H5291><s%> han-na-'a-Ra me the damsel לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> le-'ish-Shah. to wife

וַיַּעֲנ֨וּ <S%H6030><s%> vai-ya-'a-Nu answered בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- And the sons יַעֲקֹ֜ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko of Jacob אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁכֶ֨ם <S%H7927><s%> she-Chem Shechem וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et חֲמ֥וֹר <S%H2544><s%> cha-Mor and Hamor אָבִ֛יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv his father בְּמִרְמָ֖ה <S%H4820><s%> be-mir-Mah deceitfully וַיְדַבֵּ֑רוּ <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Be-ru; and said אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher because טִמֵּ֔א <S%H2930><s%> tim-Me, because he had defiled אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et דִּינָ֥ה <S%H1783><s%> di-Nah Dinah אֲחֹתָֽם׃ <S%H269><s%> 'a-cho-Tam. their sister

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru And they said אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem, about לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo not נוּכַל֙ <S%H3201><s%> nu-Chal be able לַעֲשׂוֹת֙ <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-soT do הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var this thing הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh, this לָתֵת֙ <S%H5414><s%> la-Tet to give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲחֹתֵ֔נוּ <S%H269><s%> 'a-cho-Te-nu, our sister לְאִ֖ישׁ <S%H582><s%> le-'Ish another אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who ל֣וֹ lo עָרְלָ֑ה <S%H6190><s%> 'a-re-Lah; that is uncircumcised כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- would be a חֶרְפָּ֥ה <S%H2781><s%> cher-Pah for that [were] a reproach הִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> hi he לָֽנוּ׃ La-nu.

אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> 'ach- Only בְּזֹ֖את <S%H2063><s%> be-Zot But in this נֵא֣וֹת <S%H225><s%> ne-'ot will we consent לָכֶ֑ם la-Chem; אִ֚ם <S%H518><s%> 'im if תִּהְי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yu will become כָמֹ֔נוּ <S%H3644><s%> cha-Mo-nu, like לְהִמֹּ֥ל <S%H4135><s%> le-him-Mol of you be circumcised לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- every זָכָֽר׃ <S%H2145><s%> za-Char. unto you If ye will be as we [be] that every male

וְנָתַ֤נּוּ <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-Tan-nu Then will we give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּנֹתֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H1323><s%> be-no-Tei-nu our daughters לָכֶ֔ם la-Chem, וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בְּנֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1323><s%> be-no-tei-Chem your daughters נִֽקַּֽח־ <S%H3947><s%> nik-kach- unto you and we will take לָ֑נוּ La-nu; וְיָשַׁ֣בְנוּ <S%H3427><s%> ve-ya-Shav-nu to us and we will dwell אִתְּכֶ֔ם <S%H854><s%> 'it-te-Chem, for וְהָיִ֖ינוּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yi-nu and become לְעַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> le-'Am people אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad. with you and we will become one

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- if לֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> lo you will not תִשְׁמְע֛וּ <S%H8085><s%> tish-me-'U But if ye will not hearken אֵלֵ֖ינוּ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-nu to us לְהִמּ֑וֹל <S%H4135><s%> le-him-Mol; unto us to be circumcised וְלָקַ֥חְנוּ <S%H3947><s%> ve-la-Kach-nu then will we take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בִּתֵּ֖נוּ <S%H1323><s%> bit-Te-nu our daughter וְהָלָֽכְנוּ׃ <S%H1980><s%> ve-ha-La-che-nu. and we will be gone

וַיִּֽיטְב֥וּ <S%H3190><s%> vai-yi-te-Vu seemed דִבְרֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1697><s%> div-rei-Hem And their words בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei affliction חֲמ֑וֹר <S%H2544><s%> cha-Mor; Hamor וּבְעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> u-ve-'ei-Nei affliction שְׁכֶ֥ם <S%H7927><s%> she-Chem and Shechem בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- son חֲמֽוֹר׃ <S%H2544><s%> cha-Mor. Hamor's

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- did not אֵחַ֤ר <S%H309><s%> 'e-Char deferred הַנַּ֙עַר֙ <S%H5288><s%> han-Na-'ar And the young man לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot not to do הַדָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var, the thing כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki because חָפֵ֖ץ <S%H2654><s%> cha-Fetz because he had delight בְּבַֽת־ <S%H1323><s%> be-vat- daughter יַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko; in Jacob's וְה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu he נִכְבָּ֔ד <S%H3513><s%> nich-Bad, and he [was] more honourable מִכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> mik-Kol all בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit than all the house אָבִֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv. of his father
